attributes.action: get the courts to pay directly to victims any compensation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone is award compensation by a court,that the court pay that person straight away and then the court/goverment should be the ones to get the money from the other party either in weekly/monthly payments at the court or from an attachment to their earnings or benifit.Because more often than not the fined person will not pay any compensation.
